mapper.select: SELECT OCCRRNC_DT as "occrrncDt", HOSTNAME as "hostName", CPU_AVG as "cpuAvg", MERY_AVG as "meryAvg", DSK_AVG as "dskAvg" FROM COMTSRESOURCESSTAT ORDER BY OCCRRNC_DT DESC

SELECT LEFT(OCCRRNC_DT,6) as "occrrncMonth", HOSTNAME as "hostName", TRUNCATE(AVG(CPU_AVG),1) as "cpuAvg", TRUNCATE(AVG(MERY_AVG),1) as "meryAvg", TRUNCATE(AVG(DSK_AVG),1) as "dskAvg" FROM COMTSRESOURCESSTAT GROUP BY LEFT(OCCRRNC_DT,6), HOSTNAME ORDER BY LEFT(OCCRRNC_DT,6)

SELECT LEFT(OCCRRNC_DT,4) as "occrrncYear", HOSTNAME as "hostName", TRUNCATE(AVG(CPU_AVG),1) as "cpuAvg", TRUNCATE(AVG(MERY_AVG),1) as "meryAvg", TRUNCATE(AVG(DSK_AVG),1) as "dskAvg" FROM COMTSRESOURCESSTAT GROUP BY LEFT(OCCRRNC_DT,4), HOSTNAME ORDER BY LEFT(OCCRRNC_DT,4)
